rukus.text: Tameddurt agi, di ddunit, siwa lhawiyya, d wurar. D axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, ay d amuddir, lemmer eoin
Mara rekben di lbabuo, ad naaoen Oebbi, d idiniyen zeddigen $uoeS. Mi ten Isellek ar lberr, atnan la pcaraken
Ad nekoen ayen i sen Nefka, ad zhun, deqqal ad eoen
Day ur walan ara, Nerra loamaa n laman, wanag la pwaxvafen imdanen i sen d izzin? Day ad amnen di tkerkas, u ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Anwa i idensen kteo: win id isnulfan tikerkas af Oebbi, ne$ win irran tidep d tikerkas, mi t id tusa? Day macci d Loahennama ay d tanezdu$t i ijehliyen
Wid ijuhden ar loiha nne£, a ten Nenhu, war ccekk, s iberdan nne£. Ih, Oebbi Ippili ar lauuam
